thread.title: Roy Thomson
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Roy Thomson

author: Roy Thomson
title: Roy Thomson
text: This small group was exceuted in great precision. All the other travellers together made a great tieam and we all enjoyed. Beautiful hotels, great service and very tasty Indian and some western cusine. We got to taste local speciality food at some very good restaurants. Foot the time of landing to departing somebody will be shadowing you to take care of every aspects. Will certainly book another tour in the near future.
